thread.title: BRIEF-India's Ashok Leyland To Increase Prices Of Vehicles By Minimum Of 2 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Ashok Leyland To Increase Prices Of Vehicles By Minimum Of 2 Pct
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Ashok Leyland Ltd:
* SAYS COMPANY WOULD BE INCREASING PRICES OF ITS ENTIRE RANGE OF VEHICLES BY A MINIMUM OF 2 PERCENT
* SAYS ‍INCREASE IN PRICE IS OWING TO RISING INPUT COSTS AND IMPLEMENTATION OF AIS 140 REGULATION​
* SAYS PROPOSED PRICE INCREASE WILL BE EFFECTIVE APRIL 1 Source text - Ashok Leyland, flagship of the Hinduja Group, today announced that the Company would be increasing prices of its entire range of vehicles by a minimum of 2%. This increase in price is owing to rising input costs and implementation of AIS 140 regulation. The proposed price increase will be effective April 1, 2018. Further company coverage:
